Verses: 1 pinbu Ezhaam Maadhaththile Raajavamsaththil Pirandhavanum, Elisaamaavin Kumaaranaagiya Neththaaniyaavin Maganumaana Ismavelum, Avanudanekooda Raajaavin Prabukkalaana Paththup Perum Mispaavukku Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Vandhu, Ange Egamaai Pojanampanninaargal.

2 appozhudhu Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelum, Avanodirundha Paththupperum Ezhumbi, Baabilon Raajaa Dhesaththinmel Adhikaariyaaga Vaiththa Saappaanin Kumaaranaagiya Agikkaamin Maganaana Kedhaliyaavaip Pattayaththaal Vettinaargal.
3 mispaavile Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Irundha Ellaa Yoodharaiyum, Ange Kaanappatta Yuththamanusharaagiya Kaldheyaraiyum Ismavel Vettip Pottaan.
4 avan Kedhaliyaavaik Kondra Pinbu, Marunaalile Adhai Oruvarum Innum Ariyaadhirukkaiyil:

5 thaadiyai Siraiththu, Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththu, Thangalaik Keerikkondirundha Enbadhuper Seegemilum Seelovilum Samaariyaavilumirundhu, Thangal Kaigalil Kaanikkaigalaiyum Thoobavarkkangalaiyum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkuk Kondupogumpadi Vandhaargal.

6 appozhudhu Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavel Mispaavilirundhu Purappattu, Avargalukku Edhiraaga Azhudhukonde Nadandhuvandhu Avargalai Sandhiththapodhu, Avargalai Nokki: Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaavinidaththil Vaarungal Endraan.
7 avargal Nagaraththin Maththiyil Vandhapodhu, Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelum, Avanodirundha Manusharum Avargalai Vetti Oru Pallaththile Thallippottaargal.

8 aanaalum Avargalil Paththuper Meendhirundhaargal; Avargal Ismavelaippaarththu; Engalaik Kolai Seyyavendaam; Kodhumaiyum Vaarkodhumaiyum Enneyum Thenumulla Pudhaiyalgal Engalukku Nilaththinkeezh Irukkiradhu Endraargal; Appozhudhu Avargalai Avargal Sagodhararodunkooda Kolaiseyyaamal Vittuvaiththaan.

9 ismavel Kedhaliyaavinimiththam Vettina Manusharudaiya Predhangalaiyellaam Erindhupotta Pallamovenil, Aasaa Ennum Raajaa Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Paashaavinimiththam Undupannina Pallandhaane; Adhai Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavel Vettunda Predhangalaal Nirappinaan.

10 pinbu Ismavel Mispaavil Irukkira Meedhiyaana Janaththaiyellaam Siraippaduththikkonduponaan; Raajaavin Kumaaraththigalaiyum Kaavarchenaadhipadhiyaagiya Nebusaraadhaan Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaavin Visaarippukku Oppuviththup Pona Mispaavilulla Meedhiyaana Sagala Janangalaiyum Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavel Siraippaduththikkondu Ammon Puththirar Patchaththil Pogap Purappattaan.
11 neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavel Seydha Pollaappaiyellaam Kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanum, Avanodirundha Ellaa Raanuva Servaikkaararum Kettapodhu.
12 avargal Purusharaiyellaam Koottikkondu, Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelode Yuththam Pannappoi, Avanaik Kibiyonilirukkum Perunkulaththuth Thanneerandaiyile Kandaargal.
13 appozhudhu Ismavelodirundha Sagala Janangalum Kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanaiyum, Avanodirundha Ellaa Raanuva Servaikkaararaiyum Kandu Sandhoshappattu,
14 ismavel Mispaavilirundhu Siraippidiththukkondupona Janangalellaam Pinnittuth Thirumbi, Kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanidaththil Vandhuvittaargal.
15 neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelo, Ettupperodunkooda Yoganaanin Kaikkuth Thappi, Ammon Puththiraridaththil Ponaan.

16 kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanum, Avanodirundha Ellaa Raanuva Servaikkaararum, Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaavai Vettip Potta Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavel Konduponadhum, Thaangal Kibiyonile Vidudhalaiyaakkith Thirumbappanninadhumaana Meedhiyaana Sagala Janamumaagiya Sevagaraana Manusharaiyum, Sthreegalaiyum, Kuzhandhaigalaiyum, Aramanaip Pradhaanigalaiyum Serththukkondu,
17 baabilon Raajaa Dhesaththin Mel Adhikaariyaakkina Agikkaamin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaavai Neththaaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Ismavel Vettippottadhinimiththam, Kaldheyarukku Bayandhapadiyinaal,
18 thaangal Egipthukkup Pogap Purappattu, Bethlagemoorukku Arugaana Kimkaamin Pettaiyil Thangiyirundhaargal.
